common.controllers

Class BoardSelectionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
      • common.controllers.BoardSelectionController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChangeRefController, RemoveSquareController, SelectSixController, ShuffleBoardController, Swap2Controller, TypeSelectionController

    public class BoardSelectionController
extends java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
    Creates a foundation for controllers which make act on BoardView boundary objects. -Automatically handles selection, highlighting, and deselection. -Subclasses can override the isValid() and doAction() methods to develop unique behaviors.
    Author:
    Nicholas Panzarino, jasirocki - jdoc

        public boolean isValid(AbstractSquare s)

      • doReleased

        public void doReleased(Selection selection)
        This method will be called at the start of every MouseReleased event. Can be overridden to add custom actions to the end of a Selection.
